title: Men's Solid Long Sleeve Dress Shirt with Matching Tie and Handkerchief Set Classic Button Down Formal Business Shirts
description: Mens Dress Shirt and Tie Set: These formal shirt matching tie and handkerchief complete the ensemble effortlessly, eliminating the need to search for complementary accessories separately. The set presents a sharp and cohesive look. It combines style, fit, and convenience to make you look and feel best

Formal Shirt: these business dress shirt are make of 60% polyster，40% cotton that is soft, very comfortable, and holds shape. The matching tie is silky to the touch with vibrant colors. This set contributes to that sense of style and sophistication

Regular Fit Mens Shirts Design: casual long sleeve button down formal shirt, real pocket on chest, regular fit tailoring style. The collar stands strong when wearing a necktie. Skin-friendly touch and Exquisite workmanship, makes our business shirt a formal, classic, stylish style

Mens Shirt Occasion: Business, Wedding, Office, Tuxedo, Valentine, Funeral, Homcoming, whether for formal occasions or daily casual, this mens dress shirt is a perfect choice. It is also an ideal present for your husband, son and fiance

Warm Tips: Machine Wash Cold Inside Out , Hand wash suggest, Do not bleach. The product will be wrinkled when the compressed package is first opened. Recommended to iron it or hang it to dry after washing for the first time. Please refer to the size chart to choose the size that suits you.
